message:
The Secret Messages Inside Chinese URLs  via @tnr http://www.newrepublic.com/article/117608/chinese-number-websites-secret-meaning-urls

That was quite a mystery to me
name: When 0748 Means “Go Die": The Secret Messages Inside Chinese URLs
caption: www.newrepublic.com
description: URLs like 4008-517-517.com mean a lot more than they appear.

data.message:
"You can’t blame other countries for wanting to tell the American 250s to 0748" I lol'd at that line.
I think it's an intriguing system, reminds me of how Franco-arabic uses numbers to denote letters as well. It seems quite convenient for non-latin alphabets.
